npcs.name: Lady
npcs.msg:
You should avoid the forest stranger!
There are some dangerous monsters out there.

npcs.name: Girl
npcs.msg:
Are you looking for the wizard lady?
She must be somewhere east.

npcs.name: Master Shoji
npcs.msg:
Open your quick travel menu by clicking 
the worldmap icon below and travel
to Monsoon Town!

npcs.name: Rose
npcs.msg:
Check out Mr. Smith's shop near the harbor!
He has some cool relics in store.

npcs.name: Arena
npcs.msg: You must be at least level 5 to enter!

npcs.name: Arena
npcs.msg: You must be at least level 5 to enter!

npcs.name: Thomas
npcs.msg:
Wow a wizard! You must be strong!
You should enter the arena! You can win
some cool prizes there.

npcs.name: Matthew
npcs.msg:
Landor won the gold cup 3 times in a row.
He is the best fighter EVER!

npcs.name: Guard
npcs.msg: Enter the arena at your own risk!

npcs.name: Sunwell City Shop
npcs.msg: Check out my new relic shop!

npcs.name: Lady
npcs.msg:
The captain in the Harbor needs help
You seem strong. I'm sure you could help him.

npcs.name: Landor
npcs.msg:
One day I will be the strongest warrior
in the whole world!

npcs.name: Lucas
npcs.msg:
You wizards always seek for wisdom.
For me, loyalty that matters.

npcs.name: Sir Bertrand
npcs.msg:
Look at my squires. If it comes to a battle,
noone on this earth can beat them.

npcs.name: Mr. Smith
npcs.msg: Hi! Wanna check out my shop?

npcs.name: Mr. Miller
npcs.msg: Hi! Wanna check out my shop?

npcs.name: Johnny Rage
npcs.msg:
you shouldn't be talking to this
npc mate.

npcs.name: Uncle Bob
npcs.msg: What are you doing up here?

npcs.name: Girl
npcs.msg: I have my eyes on you cheater!

npcs.name: Guard
npcs.msg: I'm just glad you came by!

npcs.name: Guard
npcs.msg:
Mr. Johnson not willing to close his shop
He says he ain't gonna lose customers just
because some freak swarming the city...

npcs.name: Lucas
npcs.msg:
Hurry! Master Bertrand and the wizard Lady
needs your help!

npcs.name: Guard
npcs.msg: Can you take care of this skeleton?
